short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to improve user experience by reducing eye strain and promoting comfortable viewing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is designed to improve user experience by providing functionalities aimed at reducing eye strain and promoting comfortable viewing. By incorporating this tool, users can enhance the accessibility and usability of their applications, ensuring that the eyes can comfortably interact with the interface for extended periods without experiencing discomfort or fatigue.
